item.title: Jogulamba Gadwal: Two killed, three injured in road accident on NH-44 near Itikyala
item.description:
<![CDATA[Jogulamba Gadwal: Two killed, three injured in road accident on NH-44 near Itikyala
Dharma Reddy, a native of Hyderabad, along with his family members was heading towards Nandyal to attend a function. However, near Hotel Priyadarshi, the car in which they were travelling lost control and fell on the roadside, according to reports.
By Telangana Today Updated On - 19 April 2025, 11:37 AM
Representational Image.
Jogulamba Gadwal: Two persons died on the spot and three others suffered injuries i...]]>
item.author: Telangana Today
